text: When the Ham Turned is a 1914 American comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Raymond McKee - A. Hamo * Ed Lawrence - The Mayor * C.W. Ritchie - Police Chief * Oliver Hardy - Bartender (as Babe Hardy) ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:American films Category:American silent short films Category:1914 short films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:Films directed by Frank Griffin Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: When the Ham Turned
